Module com.fy916.bubblebobble

Package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.features.updater

package com.fy916.bubblebobble.gaming.elements.features.updater
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    LocationUpdater
    An Interface which offers the location updating methods for the MovingObject.
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BubbleUpdater
    A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Bubble location updater.
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
    EnemyUpdater
    A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Enemy location updater.
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
    GeneralLocationUpdater
    A general location updater for all MovingObject, implements the interface LocationUpdater
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
    HeroUpdater
    A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Hero location updater.
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
    ProjectileUpdater
    A subclass of GeneralLocationUpdater which extends it to illustrate the Projectile location updater.
    This shows the STRATEGY, STATES and TEMPLATE Design Pattern.
